title: Toxic players
body: It's hard to play the game when someone in ur team is asking for kills when hes not a carry started to troll me and not give me blue. Then he called me alot of bad words. Cant play properly and blamed me for stealing his kills. My mental just went boom after he flamed me so hard. I just wish players wont be that harsh sometimes. Cause it makes me wanna say alot of things back to them.

replies.body:
I probably wouldn't be so horrible to people if rito started giving me 5v5s. 
Not this 1v9 bullcrap.
What champ did he play? and what position were you? When you say flamed you. What did he says?
Mute him and report him after the game. Nothing more you can do.
